title: freebsd - google-drive cannot be attached as external storage
body:
in personal settings enabling google-drive as external storage fails

symptoms:
- workflow seems ok: enter name for google drive, select google drive from drop down, grant access, confirm access on google webpage. problem: red dot left of name, no drive visible

check:
- does not work with fresh install either (checked with sqlite and mysql)

system:
owncloud-5.0.4

freebsd 9.0 powerpc with ports (selection)
php53-5.3.22
apache22-2.2.23_4
sqlite3-3.7.14.1
mysql-server-5.1.68
and lots of others


- new stuff -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

added - browser

safari 6.0.3, mac osx 10.8.3

added - logs:

owncloud.log

{"app":"core","message":"storage backend \\\\oc\\\\files\\\\storage\\\\google not found","level":3,"time":1365871800}
{"app":"php","message":"undefined index: \\\\oc\\\\files\\\\storage\\\\google at \/usr\/local\/www\/ocnew\/apps\/files_external\/lib\/config.php#200","level":2,"time":1365871801}

/var/log/httpd-access.log
